channel.title: RuneSource - The Private Server For Humans
channel.description:
Welcome to the Official RuneSource development thread. Here you can monitor the progress of the next generation open source RuneScape Framework.
Progress: Logging in: 6/18/2010 Packet deciphering: 6/18/2010 MySQL handling: 6/18/2010 Implementing script handler: 6/19/2010 Dispatch packets to correct handler: 6/19/2010 Sending Packets to the client: 6/19/2010 Setting sidebar interfaces: 6/20/2010 Chatbox and Inventory(blocking) Interfaces: 6/21/2010 Command handling: 6/21/2010 Encrypted password storing: 6/23/2010
Currently Working on: Event handler Chat handling Player rendering
Newest Image of Progress: [IMG]http://i44.photobucket.com/albums/f8/zyle269952/2010-06-22-144119_765x505_scrot.png[/img]
Example of the encrypted password: [code=MySQL] +------------+----------+----------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------+ | uid | username | password | salt | +------------+----------+----------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------+ | 1297935705 | zymus | zj7/PjMSHc4oy8jYr4ROZ9OcMUPQOskkkmUiAPnJbCE= | HoHE92SCJaBFoz0c1yLvPf/82rXK1YjC9k8dQ+QjTRw= | +------------+----------+----------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------+ [/code]

item.title: RuneSource - The Private Server For Humans
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Welcome to the Official RuneSource development thread. Here you can monitor the progress of the next generation open source RuneScape Framework.

Progress:
Logging in: 6/18/2010
Packet deciphering: 6/18/2010
MySQL handling: 6/18/2010
Implementing script handler: 6/19/2010
Dispatch packets to correct handler: 6/19/2010
Sending Packets to the client: 6/19/2010
Setting sidebar interfaces: 6/20/2010
Chatbox and Inventory(blocking) Interfaces: 6/21/2010
Command handling: 6/21/2010
Encrypted password storing: 6/23/2010

Currently Working on:
Event handler
Chat handling
Player rendering

Newest Image of Progress:

Example of the encrypted password:

+------------+----------+----------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------+
| uid        | username | password                                     | salt                                         |
+------------+----------+----------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------+
| 1297935705 | zymus    | zj7/PjMSHc4oy8jYr4ROZ9OcMUPQOskkkmUiAPnJbCE= | HoHE92SCJaBFoz0c1yLvPf/82rXK1YjC9k8dQ+QjTRw= |
+------------+----------+----------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------+
